summary: The Next of Kin Collections Protection Act of 2025 amends Title 38 of the United States Code to improve laws concerning the payment of certain benefits administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs after the death of a beneficiary. It addresses the effective date of benefit reductions and discontinuances, particularly for pension payments, and ensures payment of benefits for the month of death. The bill aims to protect veterans' families by clarifying and streamlining benefit processes.
